capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Responsible for coordinating and monitoring visitor activities to enhance understanding of the cultural landscape, requiring efficient use of resources.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Needs to organize team schedules, manage budgets, and plan community events, indicating strong planning and prioritization skills.

capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Leads and supervises a team of Visitor Services Assistants, indicating a need for developing team capability.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Works closely with Traditional Owners, community groups, and local government, requiring effective collaboration.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Must communicate across cultures and with a variety of stakeholders, indicating the need for clear and respectful communication.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Role requires working closely with Aboriginal communities and respecting cultural knowledge, highlighting the importance of valuing diversity.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsible for the care, control, and management of the Worimi Conservation Lands, requiring adherence to policies and proactive risk management.

skills.name: Cultural Knowledge Sharing
skills.description: Sharing and appropriately communicating Worimi cultural knowledge with visitors and stakeholders.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Engaging with community groups, local government, and commercial tour operators to plan and deliver community events.

skills.name: Team Leadership
skills.description: Leading and supervising a team of Visitor Services Assistants, developing their capabilities.

generalRole.title: Cultural Heritage and Conservation Coordinator
generalRole.description: This role involves coordinating visitor services and activities within conservation lands, with a focus on enhancing understanding of Aboriginal cultural landscapes, managing and developing a team, and working collaboratively with various stakeholders to protect and respect cultural and environmental values.
